S

showAndWait() - Method in class Window
Hide the Stage in case it isn't already hidden and then show it, and wait until it is hidden once again before continuing with the current Thread.
Sound - Class in <Unnamed>
The Sound class This class stores sound media, and allows specific AudioClips to be played, stopped, and looped.
Sound(String) - Constructor for class Sound
This is the class constructor.
SplashScreen - Class in <Unnamed>
The Splashscreen class This class represents the window with an animation that plays at the start of the program with the Pistachio Labs logo, and then loads program Resources to avoid lag during runtime.
SplashScreen(Stage) - Constructor for class SplashScreen
This is the class constructor.
StageManager - Class in <Unnamed>
The StageManager class This class puts together all the windows of the program, and organises the program flow.
StageManager() - Constructor for class StageManager
 
start(Stage) - Method in class StageManager
This method will load all the necessary Sound resources into the Resources class, open all the necessary windows and will control the program's flow.
stop() - Method in class Sound
This method stops the sound.
stopAll() - Static method in class Sound
This static method stops all AudioClips created with this class, by looping through the static ArrayList all, and calling stop() on each element.
